alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lafayette; Nevada; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 10:22AM CST until January 18 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Union County in south central Arkansas... Southeastern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1100 AM CST. * At 1022 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smithland, or 11 miles southeast of Stamps, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Waldo, McNeil, Taylor, Buckner, Bussey, Mount Holly, Smithland, Village, Lisbon, Macedonia, Calhoun, Mount Vernon, Lerch, Laughlin, College Hill, Spotville, Medlock, Young and McKamie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for south central and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for south central and southwestern Arkansas.
